content:
hello all,
here http://build.fhir.org/patient-mappings.html given different mappings, if anybody knows the mapped version of v2 and v3 please let me know.
V3 is to the "current" RIM - which hasn't changed in several years. I think v2 was 2.8.1 or 2.8.2 - but most of the content mapped to has been around for much longer
